meanings.definition: Excessive focus or concentration on something.
meanings.sent1: Her overattention to detail made her the best detective in town.
meanings.sent2: His overattention to his phone caused him to miss the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent3: The overattention to his pet goldfish's activities was endearing.
meanings.sent4: Her overattention to the clock made time seem to slow down.
meanings.sent5: The overattention to the tiny ant crawling on the leaf was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The act of paying too much attention to a particular thing.
meanings.sent1: The child's overattention to the shiny toy distracted him from his homework.
meanings.sent2: The overattention to gossip led to misunderstandings among friends.
meanings.sent3: His overattention to the squirrel in the park made him bump into a tree.
meanings.sent4: The overattention to the details of the painting revealed hidden symbols.
meanings.sent5: Her overattention to the recipe ingredients resulted in a delicious cake.
